Title: Fantasia
Description: Fantasia is a 2d pixel art side scroller game made with unity engine. It's a story driven single player game with the atmosphere as it's focus, inspired by many other souls like games.
Sidenote: Fantasia is my university final project.

Title: Wired City
Description: Wired City is a blogsite made in Wordpress that uses plugins such as Elementor, Yoast SEO, Disquss, Astra, and More. The site is primarily used for blogging and has other feature supporting it.
Sidenote: Wired City my an independent study project with kampus merdeka.

Title: Wired Gun Store
Description: Wired Gun Store is an e-commerce website made in Wordpress that uses plugins such as Elementor, WooCommerce, Jivochat, and More. The site is primarily used as a marketplace for selling a product.
Sidenote: Wired City my an independent study project with kampus merdeka.
